label:label.xlink:title: Flag if codes reported in LEC (C06.02) and LEC (F40.01) are below 40% of the total LEC codes reported in both templates and, either the percentage of LECs existing only in C06.02 (after subtracting 1) is greater than the percentage of common LECs (=LECs appearing in both templates), or the percentage of LECs existing only in C06.02 (after subtracting 1) is greater than 20%

gen:link.label:label: Flag if codes reported in LEC (C06.02) and LEC (F40.01) are below 40% of the total LEC codes reported in both templates and, either the percentage of LECs existing only in C06.02 (after subtracting 1) is greater than the percentage of common LECs (=LECs appearing in both templates), or the percentage of LECs existing only in C06.02 (after subtracting 1) is greater than 20%
